  ```{r Dataset_Export_GTA_View_IOTC, echo = FALSE, eval = FALSE}
NC_IOTC_LEVEL0 = NC_MAPPED_SPECIES_GEAR_FLEET_GEARGROUP_AREA[, .(schooltype = "UNK", catchtype = "UNK", value = sum(CATCH)), keyby = .(source_authority, fishingfleet = fleet, gear, gear_group = GEAR_GROUP_CODE, species, time_start, time_end, month = month(time_start), quarter = quarter(time_start), year = year(time_start), time_period = difftime(time_end, time_start, units = "days"), id_area = fifelse(geographic_identifier == "F51", 71942, fifelse(geographic_identifier == "F57", 71941, as.numeric(NA))), longitude = fifelse(geographic_identifier == "F51", 56.9674121789439, fifelse(geographic_identifier == "F57", 105.051972813222, as.numeric(NA))), latitude = fifelse(geographic_identifier == "F51", -16.0981009445054, fifelse(geographic_identifier == "F57", -26.9732388924692, as.numeric(NA))), geographic_identifier, unit)]

NC_IOTC_FIRMS = setcolorder(NC_IOTC_LEVEL0, neworder = c("source_authority", "fishingfleet", "gear", "gear_group", "species", "schooltype", "time_start", "time_end", "month", "quarter", "year", "time_period", "id_area", "geographic_identifier", "catchtype", "unit", "longitude", "latitude", "value"))

# Export the final data set (input for GTA)
write.csv(NC_IOTC_FIRMS, file = paste0("../outputs/datasets/nominal_catch_iotc_level0_", Sys.Date(), ".csv"), row.names = FALSE)
```
